body.p: This procedure describes how to make the recommended configuration changes to achieve 8,000 virtual machine instances.

p.note: In a scale environment for ESX computes, the configuration of vCenter Proxy VM has to be increased to 8 vCPUs and 16 GB RAM. By default it is 4 vCPUs and 4 GB RAM.

ol.li: Change the directory. The nova.conf.j2 file is present in following directories:cd /home/stack/helion/hos/ansible/roles/nova-common/templates
Edit the DEFAULT section in the nova.conf.j2 file as below:[DEFAULT] rpc_responce_timeout = 180 server_down_time = 300 report_interval = 30
Commit your configuration:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Execute the nova-reconfigure playbook:ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts nova-reconfigure.yml
